decision_conditions: Design ext appearance OK not in CA
Design ext appearance OK not in CA
Hrs bldg wks resi amenity adj occ
Dvpmt in accordance with approvd plans
DES External works to match existing
+2 Ensure time limit is same as original
Amenity roof building not sitting out
description: Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 10th July 2024 (RN: 24/03367/FULL) for the Variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 12 January 2024 (RN: 23/08381/FULL) for the: Alterations including: Removal of Reinforced Autoclaved Aerated Concrete (RAAC) from building; Infill of existing undercroft; re-cladding of building with new windows, roof and skylights; alterations to and removal of side ground floor infill to provide side access route; provision of green roof; installation of PV panels to roof; installation of replacement retractable canopy; erection of timber fence extension to western boundary. Namely, second floor omission and integration of ELSA room on first floor, cladding design update, new building height following second floor omission and minor changes to windows and doors.
